Class Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Gobang game (board and score)

advance

public boolean advance(Point p,
                       int d)
Moves Point in direction.

Parameters:
p - Point
d - Direction (0-7, 0 is north, positive rotation (1 is NW and so on))
Returns:
False if the Point slips off the edge of the board (always true when wraparound is active)

streak

public int[] streak(Point p,
                    int dir)
Counts the length of the streak of same values on the board in a direction

Parameters:
p - Point of origin
dir - Direction
Returns:
Array of two integers - first is the length of the streak, second is the color that ends the streak (-1 if edge)

The color of the opposing player

move

public int move(Point p)
Makes a move

Parameters:
p - Point
Returns:
-1 if the move is illegal, 1 if the move wins the game
